fields.label: General Details
What Type of Content Is This Page?
fields.name: expertise_type

fields.label: Use This Page's Intro Text As the Short Description for This Page?
fields.name: expertise_short_desc_query
fields.instructions:
Decide which text to use as the short description. The short description is what is included for this area of expertise page when it appears in search results and in lists on our site.

The Intro Text is defined in under the Page Header Details tab. Choosing the "Hero" header style will force the Short Description to be used.

Whichever text that is used should be written in a way that generally informs and interests users with a short, relevant summary of what this page is about. Think of it like a pitch that convinces the user that this page is exactly what they're looking for.

If the intro text is not written in that way, the short description should be defined separately.

fields.label: Short Description for This Page
fields.name: post_excerpt
fields.instructions:
This will be the description included for this page when it appears in search results and in lists on our site.

Write a short description that generally informs and interests users with a short, relevant summary of what this page is about. Think of it like a pitch that convinces the user that this page is exactly what they're looking for.

The text will be limited to 160 characters. The preferred length is at least 110 characters.

fields.label: Selected Post Excerpt
fields.name: expertise_selected_post_excerpt
fields.instructions: Dynamically populated by an 'acf/save_post' action

fields.label: Featured Image for This Page
fields.name: _thumbnail_id
fields.instructions:
Recommended dimensions: 2560x1920 or larger. Minimum dimensions: 1280x720.

The image will be automatically cropped to a 16:9 aspect ratio when used on the site; 1.91:1 aspect ratio when sharing to Facebook and Twitter.

fields.label: Page Header Details
Page Header Style
fields.name: expertise_page_title_options
fields.instructions: This selector is only visible to users with the following roles: Super Admin, Administrator, Editor.

fields.label: Graphic Header Style Options
fields.name: expertise_page_title_graphic
fields.instructions: Reach out to UAMS Web Services to discuss whether this page would benefit from a different page header style.

fields.label: Marketing Landing Page Header Style Options
fields.name: expertise_page_title_landingpage

fields.label: Hero Header Style Options
fields.name: expertise_page_title_hero

fields.label: Brand
Third-Party Brand Organization
fields.name: expertise_brandorg

fields.label: Area of Expertise Details
Alternate Name(s) for This Area of Expertise
fields.name: expertise_alternate_names
fields.instructions:
Insert any other names, phrases or acronyms that this area of expertise may be known by. Separate each alternate name into its own item.

These alternate names will be used to help this page appear in search results for those terms.

fields.label: Associated Media
Featured Video (Deprecated)
fields.name: expertise_youtube_link
fields.instructions: Select a video from the UAMS YouTube or Vimeo accounts that features this area of expertise and that supports the content of this page. Include the full URL, including https://

fields.label: UAMS Health Talk Podcast Topic Name
fields.name: expertise_podcast_name
fields.instructions: Include a single topic name as listed in the "Topics" dropdown of the embedded player on https://uamshealth.com/podcast/.

fields.label: Related Providers
Related Providers
fields.name: physician_expertise
fields.instructions:
Include all providers who have this area of expertise.

The providers will be displayed on a subpage, arranged in alphabetical order by their last name.

fields.label: Override Intro Text for Related Providers Subpage
fields.name: expertise_providers_fpage_intro
fields.instructions:
The default intro text is defined in Find-a-Doc Settings, written to be generic for all subpages of this type under any area of expertise. If you leave this field blank, the text from Find-a-Doc Settings will be used. If you add text here, that text will be used instead.

This will display on the related providers subpage in a paragraph underneath the page title.

The text will be limited to 117 characters. The preferred length is at least 110 characters.

fields.label: Use Intro Text as the Short Description for Related Providers Subpage?
fields.name: expertise_providers_fpage_short_desc_query
fields.instructions:

Whichever text that is used should be written in a way that generally informs and interests users with a short, relevant summary of what this page is about. Think of it like a pitch that convinces the user that this page is exactly what they're looking for.

The text will be limited to 160 characters. The preferred length is at least 110 characters.

fields.label: Override Featured Image for Related Providers Subpage
fields.name: expertise_providers_fpage_featured_image
fields.instructions:
If you leave this blank, the default image will be used. The default image is defined in Find-a-Doc Settings.

Recommended dimensions: 2560x1920 or larger. Minimum dimensions: 1280x720.

The image will be automatically cropped to a 16:9 aspect ratio when used on the site; 1.91:1 aspect ratio when sharing to Facebook and Twitter.

fields.label: Related Areas of Expertise
Related Areas of Expertise
fields.name: expertise_associated
fields.instructions:
Include all areas of expertise that are related to this area of expertise. An example of a related area of expertise would be one that is also represented in treatment plans associated with this area of expertise.

Areas of expertise that are nested under this area of expertise are excluded from this list.

The related areas of expertise will be displayed on a subpage, arranged in alphabetical order.

fields.name: expertise_associated_fpage_intro
fields.instructions:

fields.label: Related Clinical Resources
Related Clinical Resources
fields.name: expertise_clinical_resources
fields.instructions:
Include all clinical resources that are related to this area of expertise.

These clinical resources will be displayed on a subpage, arranged in the order in which they were published, with the most recently published resources being listed first.

fields.label: Related Conditions and Treatments
Override Intro Text for Combined Related Conditions and Treatments Block
fields.name: expertise_condition_treatment_fpage_intro
fields.instructions:
The default intro text is defined in Find-a-Doc Settings, written to be generic for all blocks of this type on any area of expertise page(s). If you leave this field blank, the text from Find-a-Doc Settings will be used. If you add text here, that text will be used instead.

This will display in a related conditions and treatments block on the main page for this area of expertise in a paragraph underneath the block title.

The text will be limited to 117 characters. The preferred length is at least 110 characters.

fields.label: Related Conditions
fields.name: expertise_conditions_cpt
fields.instructions:
Include all conditions that are related to this area of expertise.

These conditions will be displayed in a block on the main page for this area of expertise, arranged in the alphabetical order.

fields.label: Override Intro Text for Related Conditions Block
fields.name: expertise_conditions_fpage_intro
fields.instructions:

fields.label: Schema Data
Relevant Specialty (relevantSpecialty > MedicalSpecialty)
fields.name: expertise_schema_medicalspecialty

fields.label: Matching Classification(s) and/or Specialization(s) From the Health Care Provider Taxonomy Code Set (code > MedicalCode)
fields.name: expertise_schema_code_nucc

fields.label: Medical Code(s) for This Entity (code > MedicalCode)
fields.name: expertise_schema_medicalcode

fields.label: Reference Webpage(s) About This Area of Expertise (sameAs > URL)
fields.name: expertise_schema_sameas

fields.label: Related System(s) of Medical Practice (medicineSystem > MedicineSystem)
fields.name: expertise_schema_medicinesystem

fields.label: Deprecated Fields
Call-to-Action (CTA) Bar(s)
fields.name: expertise_cta
fields.instructions: Define up to two CTA Bar blocks

sub_fields.label: Action Type
sub_fields.name: cta_bar_action_type
sub_fields.instructions: Only choose None if your action is contained within your body text.

sub_fields.label: URL Action
sub_fields.instructions: All fields must be populated or your link will not display.

sub_fields.label: Button Link Description
sub_fields.name: cta_bar_button_description
sub_fields.instructions: This is needed for accessibility. It helps differentiate between multiple links that use the same text like "Learn more". Describe the intent of the link, like "Learn more about the ABC Department".

sub_fields.label: Phone Action
sub_fields.instructions: All fields must be populated or your telephone number will not display.

sub_fields.label: Text before phone number
sub_fields.name: cta_bar_phone_prepend
sub_fields.instructions: This, combined with the phone number will generate a short action phrase. Keep this text very short. Do not include the phone number here. Examples: "Call", "Fax Referrals to".

sub_fields.label: Phone Number
sub_fields.name: cta_bar_phone
sub_fields.instructions: Format your phone number using dashes. Include the area code. Example: 999-999-9999

fields.label: Medical Terms (Tags)
fields.name: expertise_medical_terms
